sentences.en: ACME a now is this company.

sentences.en: After acquiring Warner Industries, stock in Acme Corp. went up by 12 %.
sentences.cn: 并购华纳企业之后, 艾克米公司的股票上涨了百分之十二.

sentences.en: After analysis of UML and ACME, UML and ACME usages in component _ oriented developing process are set forth.
sentences.cn: 在分析UML和ACME后, 文章阐述UML和ACME在构件化开发过程中的使用.

sentences.en: Finally, the implement of RSA algorithm in ACME template is given.
sentences.cn: 最后给出RSA算法实现的ACME模板 描述.

sentences.en: His work is considered the acme of cinematic art.
sentences.cn: 他的作品被认为是电影艺术的巅峰之作。

sentences.en: It is close to results of SME and ACME while it contrasts to results of IAM.
sentences.cn: 这与SME和ACME的运行结果接近,而与IAM的 运行结果不同.

sentences.en: Lastly, by analyzing the features and advantages of ACME and XML, we find the possibility of combination.
sentences.cn: 最后, 重点分析了ACME和XML两种形式化描述语言的各自特点和优势, 分析两者集成的可能性.

sentences.en: Sale pursuit essence is accurate, acme target is personalized sale.
sentences.cn: 营销追求精准, 极致目标是个性化营销.

sentences.en: Schencrt reach the acme of his skill while quite young.
sentences.cn: 舒伯特的技巧在他十分年轻时即已达顶峰.

sentences.en: Stub acme thread on stem provides rapid open - close operation.
sentences.cn: 阀杆上的短梯形螺纹适用于快速启闭操作.

sentences.en: The Acme order? I mailed it out this morning.
sentences.cn: 艾克明的定货 吗 ?我今天早上寄出去了.

sentences.en: This new Acme brand rice cooker is really A - one quality.
sentences.cn: 这个新艾克美牌的电饭锅的品质真好.

sentences.en: This piece of art work has achieved the acme of perfection.
sentences.cn: 这件工艺品达到了尽善尽美的程度.
